page.title: 01OUR AREA GRID REF.04360267 .
page.content: The River Leam runs from the North East corner to the South West corner of the survey area.The River Itchen runs North Easterly from the South West. The river Leam runs through{ {Eathorpe.Wappenbury}and{Hunningham. The water shed separates the two rivers going North East to the South West and rises to 100m.The two main roads are the B4453 which connects {Leamington }and {Rugby }and runs through {Weston Under Wetherley}and the Fosse Way,the B4029 through {Hunningham}and {Eathorpe}.The Fosse Way is a Roman Road and runs from {Lincoln} to {Seaton }in Devon.The four small villages are in undulating countryside with farms.There are no schools at the villages so the children have to go to Cubbington school by bus.
